name: OctopusPackNuGet
description: Package your application into a NuGet file.
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: PackageId
inputs.label: Package ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the package. e.g. MyCompany.App

inputs.name: PackageVersion
inputs.label: Package Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the package; must be a valid [SemVer](http://semver.org/) version.

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder containing the files and folders to package. Defaults to working directory.

inputs.name: OutputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory into which the generated package will be written. Defaults to working directory.

inputs.name: Include
inputs.label: Include
inputs.helpMarkDown: File patterns to include, relative to the root path. e.g. /bin/*.dll. Defaults to '**' if not specified.

inputs.name: NuGetDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: A description to add to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetAuthors
inputs.label: Authors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authors to add to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetTitle
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: A title to add to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release notes to add to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetReleaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release Notes File
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file containing release notes to add to the NuGet package metadata. Overrides `NuGetReleaseNotes`.

inputs.name: Overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allow an existing package of the same ID and version to be overwritten.

OutputVariables.name: package_file_path
OutputVariables.description: The full path to the package file that was created.

OutputVariables.name: package_filename
OutputVariables.description: The filename of the package that was created.
